org.aludratest.service.file.impl

Class AbstractFileAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.aludratest.service.file.impl.AbstractFileAction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileConditionImpl, FileInteractionImpl, FileVerificationImpl

    public abstract class AbstractFileAction
extends Object
    Parent class for all Action interface implementations of the FileService.
    Author:
    Volker Bergmann

      • getChildren

        public List<String> getChildren(String filePath,
                                String filterRegex)
        Lists all child elements of the given folder which match the given regular expression.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the path of the directory to read
        filterRegex - a regular expression for filtering file paths
        Returns:
        a List of all children that match the filterRegex

                                FileFilter filter)
        Lists all child elements of the given folder which match the filter.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the path of the directory to read
        filter - a filter for choosing files
        Returns:
        a List of all children that match the filter
